question:
What is the percentage of element chlorine in carcinogenic molecules?
chlorine refers to element = 'cl'; label = '+' mean molecules are carcinogenic; percentage = DIVIDE(SUM(element = 'pb'); COUNT(molecule_id)) as percentage where label = '+'
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.element = 'cl' THEN T1.element ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(T1.element), 0) FROM atom AS T1 INNER JOIN molecule AS T2 ON T1.molecule_id = T2.molecule_id WHERE T2.label = '+'
